metadata.description: FDA regulatory tools for medical device 510(k) analysis, predicate extraction, and submission preparation. v5.27.0 completes TICKET-001: Pre-Sub eSTAR/PreSTAR XML with all pipeline fixes (meeting type filtering, deduplication, placeholder tracking). v5.26.0 adds automated data updates and multi-device section comparison. v5.25.1 fixes critical security and compliance issues. v5.23.0 adds AI-powered standards generation.

plugins.name: fda-tools
plugins.description: AI-powered FDA 510(k) regulatory assistant with 51 commands, 12 agents â€” NEW v5.27.0: TICKET-001 COMPLETE - Pre-Sub eSTAR/PreSTAR XML with pipeline fixes (meeting type filtering, deduplication, placeholder tracking, 15/15 tests passing) | v5.26.0: Automated data updates and multi-device section comparison | v5.25.1: Critical security and compliance fixes | v5.25.0: PreSTAR XML generation with 6 meeting types, 35-question bank | v5.23.0: AI-powered standards generation | Phase 5: workflow orchestration, streaming processor, semantic search | Phase 4: ML-powered predicate recommendations, automated gap analysis | Phase 3: MAUDE peer comparison, competitive intelligence | Phase 1-2: data provenance, quality validation, CFR citations | Core features: predicate extraction, substantial equivalence analysis, submission drafting, FDA review simulation, safety surveillance, guidance lookup, standards generation, and full eSTAR/PreSTAR export | Agent-based architecture uses installing user's Claude Code access
